entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming north 20 overnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:53 PM CST Sunday 19 February 2023
